subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Sarah Estep's tapings with reel to reel?
author: Lisby
full_text:
Yes--Sarah used reel-to-reel and occasionally cassette. I bought my  
first reel-to-reel from her husband, back in the day. Sarah had a  
bunch of them and her husband was always looking for them at yards  
sales to pass onto AAEVP members. He'd get them and fix them up. I  
still have the one he got for me. I used several back them myself and  
had three or four when I had to pause in taping for the birth of my  
son. It took me many years to get back to it...

Ann
